articles.content: The Grand Tour host Jeremy Clarkson, 60, has said he had to go to one of his daughters for some much-needed guidance with a new project as he didn't "understand" what he had to do. The Top Gear star … [+1995 chars]

articles.title: Man who fainted in front of Prince Charles explains what really happened - Express
articles.description: THE ASDA worker who fainted in front of Prince Charles during a royal visit this week has revealed what really happened - and shed light on a touching gesture from the Prince of Wales after his scare.
